column4: hi   is there anyone here who can give me a good link on how to install aixgl on my dapper?
booted with sabayon live miniedition and it' s supported
supported on my system that is
I ' ve tried some links but I allways stumble onto errors     eg  repo's that have an incorrect url
and a pretty good one too if made correctly    but I 'm talking about the dstro
I cant, distro war and such
I 'm on ubuntu dapper right now
I 'm on dapper right now   so there' s no need for any war :)   I just want to install aixgl on my system    I' m a bit of an eyecandy-boy
I could only help on AIXGL on the mother (or father) or sabayon, no use here
I run a source system, sorry
but I'm stuck here  deb http://ubuntu.compiz.net/ dapper main aiglx          and here    wget http://ubuntu.compiz.net/quinn.key.asc -O - | sudo apt-key add -        these addresses aren' t right
